His body crumples, his cheek landing flat against the tile. Glistening shards of mirror glass lie around him. As he stares at his reflection in one, he gets the idea.

dialogues.speaker: PHYSICAL THERAPY ROOM
dialogues.text: begin to quiver.   The color drains.    Blackness is wait

dialogues.speaker: CORRIDOR
dialogues.text: slides his back up the wall as he reels in that shard of mirror.

dialogues.speaker: PHYSICAL THERAPY ROOM
dialogues.text: posture begins to change. Mammon's form ripples through her -- starts to push out through her skin. Gabriel stands behind her, his wings cocooned around her waist. GABRIEL (whispering to her)

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Cross the bridge to your destiny...

dialogues.speaker: CORRIDOR
dialogues.text: pulls up his sleeve, exposes his old scar. He pauses a beat, closes his eyes. STAY ON his face as he makes one swift SLICE movement. But he's in a rush here -- makes that same motion across his other wrist as well. With both wrists purging his life away, John settles back into the corner and waits for the inevitable. JOHN

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Hurry...

dialogues.speaker: PHYSICAL THERAPY ROOM
dialogues.text: reveals the Spear.

dialogues.speaker: CORRIDOR
dialogues.text: is dying.    Eyes are starting to close as...

dialogues.speaker: PHYSICAL THERAPY ROOM
dialogues.text: Raises the Spear over Angela's chest. HEAR the SOUNDS of a million DEMONS inside of her ready to break free -- He holds the Spear high above her chest -- readies for the final thrust as --

dialogues.speaker: CORRIDOR
dialogues.text: Bulbs flicker as current ramps down and TIME COMES TO A COMPLETE STOP. All we're left with is a distant METALLIC DRONE, like the reverberation of a gong struck a thousand years ago. John lies in that dim half-light.    Motionless. Something starts to swirl near him and just like that, John is no longer alone. Shadow falls over his pathetic form. SATAN (O.S.)

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: The time has come at last to collect your soul.

dialogues.speaker: CONTINUED
dialogues.text: John pries his eyes open...

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Hello, John.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: You're early.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: You're the one show I wouldn't miss.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: So I've heard. Satan sees John's slit wrists.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: I didn't think you'd make the same mistake twice. John looks up at him.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: You didn't, did you?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: ... so how's your son?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: And why would that matter to you?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: ... he's topside...

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: I know.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: With Gabriel.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Your point?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: He's helping your son create his own Hell on Earth...

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Well, boys will be boys...

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: He has the Spear of Destiny.

dialogues.speaker: CONTINUED
dialogues.text: Satan didn't know that.     Now he's concerned.     He st this dying man.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: This is another one of your cons.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Go look for yourself... Satan is still suspicious.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: You've waited twenty years for me, what's another twenty seconds? Satan contemplates his remark. Metallic reverberation is overtaken as SOUND and MOTION ramp back to real time --

dialogues.speaker: PHYSICAL THERAPY ROOM
dialogues.text: is about to be thrust into Angela's chest.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Gabriel? Gabriel looks up -- spots him in the room. Gabriel reacts -- pulls the spear toward her with all his might -- but Satan is faster -- Angela vanishes and Gabriel has now pierced dead air. Satan holds Angela tight -- covering her mouth like John did. She struggles and the demon inside appears -- reflected in the huge chunks of tank glass scattered on the floor. Hideous. The real MAMMON.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Say goodbye to the sun -- both of you. Mammon SHRIEKS and Gabriel's beautiful wings ignite in

dialogues.speaker: CORRIDOR
dialogues.text: is rocked by a major jolt that shakes the entire building to its foundation. A moment later --

dialogues.speaker: CONTINUED
dialogues.text: Satan is back. John looks up, gives him that look -- you owe me. Satan hates admitting it but knows it's true.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: So... what do you want?   An extension? John shakes his head, can barely utter a sound...

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Isabel...

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: What about her?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: ... let her... go home...

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: You would give up your life so she could go to Heaven? John manages a nod...

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Fine. (closes, opens eyes)

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: It's done.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: ANGELA gasps -- her first real breath's a strain. Adrenaline rushes through her and she quickly closes her eyes --

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Stretches out BEFORE us. And here come those two swings, penduluming up in SLOW MOTION. Young Angela and Isabel share that moment again. But this time Isabel lets go and jumps out of her swing. Her body sails up and away, her fingers reaching out for what seems so close... so close... Isabel keeps going until she fades into the sky.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Time to go.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: John relaxes, stops fighting the inevitable. Satan takes his hand, starts to pull him home but suddenly finds himself pulling on what seems to be infinite mass. Try as he might, he can't budge John an inch. And now John's other hand leaves his side, and as if weightless, begins to rise toward something above. No sense in beating around the bush here, John is in the embrace of God. Satan sees this and recoils in absolute RAGE -- SATAN

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: The sacrifice!! No!!!!   THIS ONE

dialogues.speaker: BELONGS TO ME
dialogues.text: John's rising hand drifts back down in front of Satan, the middle finger fully extended. Final straw. Satan goes rabid -- turns to PURE ENERGY for a split second. His hands remain on fire. SATAN

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: You will live, John Constantine, you will live so you'll have the chance to prove that your soul truly belongs in Hell. You will live! Satan eagerly plunges his blazing hands into John's body -- John screams in agony. Satan tears through his tissue -- collecting the cancer, then ripping out a mass of diseased tissue with one vengeful pull. John's final blood-curdling SCREAM ECHOES over --

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: -- through every room. Every corridor. Rippling out across the ground and finally dissipating in the hills beyond.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: On his hands and knees, John takes that first breath. New lungs fill for the first time. No cough. Not even a wheeze. Face has renewed color. Wrists have sealed tight.

dialogues.speaker: CONTINUED
dialogues.text: John is healed. He stands, steps back inside the --

dialogues.speaker: PHYSICAL THERAPY ROOM
dialogues.text: John stops over the body of one seven-foot African warrior. He stands immobilized, wrecked with emotion. SOUND draws his attention to the one thing that could cause him even greater rage --

dialogues.speaker: GABRIEL --
dialogues.text: is hunched over near a wall. Jagged cartilage stumps protrude from his back. A pattern of sinew and bone is burned into the floor behind him. It's all that remains of his once majestic wings. John approaches, spots blood dripping from the former ang He realizes what this means. Gets a kick out of it.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Human... Gabriel looks up as John retrieves a gun from the wet floor.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: You don't deserve to be human.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Then pass judgment on me now. John raises the gun -- puts it to Gabriel's forehead.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Do it.   Seek revenge.   End my life. John's finger nudges the trigger.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Kill me! Pull the trigger!     Be the hand of God! John pauses, realizes what's happening here...

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: ... and I'll be condemned again...

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Do it!

dialogues.speaker: CONTINUED
dialogues.text: It takes everything John has not to pull that trigger. He lowers the gun, shaking his head.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: You're even worthless as bait. John starts to turn away --

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Deny your true nature today, but what of tomorrow, of the tomorrow after that? It is only a matter of time before you end up right back where you belong. It is who you are, Constantine. Damned. John's fist starts behind his back, gains momentum the entire arc until it ends abruptly against Gabriel's face. The ex-angel is propelled all the way to the wall -- SLAMS HARD against the concrete. Body crumples on impact, slides down to the muck. You know this hurt like absolute hell.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: That's called pain.    Get used to it. John turns toward the double doors -- stops cold. Huddled in the doorway, covered in grime is Angela and Barry. The experience has obviously left them both drained. John walks across the room, kneels down to them.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Thank you, John. He nods, beat. Wipes a trace of blood off her brow, puts a hand on Barry's shoulder. HOLD a beat ON this gritty family tableau.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: MOVING SLOWLY PAST the inoperative device. PAST strangely-shaped objects of platinum and gold, with names and symbols that make a bit more sense now.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Huge sun beats down on a lone FIGURE walking across a stretch of the most barren landscape on Earth. He stops, kneels to the heavily-cracked soil. Starts digging.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: A HAND comes in, affixes an unseen object to a protruding rod. Its weight causes it to drop OUT OF FRAME but a moment later it rises back INTO VIEW and finds a balance.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: JOHN pulls back the protective hood from his face. Healthy and tan with a new lease on life. He pops a NICORETTE TABLET, then unwraps rolls of cloth from around the Spear of Destiny. He drops it in the hole, stares at it a long beat.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: The entire mechanism shudders. And now miraculously, every globe, every moon, every obscure object in this miniature occult universe begins to rotate in complete sync. As it does, the defining object finally slides INTO VIEW. John's lighter.   ANGELA watches it rotate past, nods in approval.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: John sighs, finally sweeps mounds of soil over the sacred relic. He stands, nods. Job done. A breeze blows past and John senses being watched. He spins and finds -- nothing. For a hundred miles. He starts walking. JOHN (V.O.)

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Some people are born to make a difference. I had to die. Twice.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: walking right in step. Something is closing in on her. A new TAXI pulls up. Chaz is driving. Angela gets in. JOHN (V.O.)

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: God does work in mysterious ways.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: John continues walking as something closes in on him at incredible speed. JOHN (V.O.)

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Some people like it... Our view RISES OVER him and gliding across the barren landscape are the SHADOW of WINGS. JOHN (V.O.)

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Some people don't.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: THE END
